dialogue.text: Ah, greetings to you! I knew you would find your way here sooner or later. I am glad that it was sooner! Pardon my little jest, ahahah.
I have a task for you, if your spirit is strong this day. Through the forest pass, across the ruins and the lake, there lives a forest ranger.
I often bring her useful things from the forest, but alas... I must remain here in my Sanctum, for the solstice draws near and there is much to be done!
Will you make the journey in my stead and see the forest ranger? Bring her anything useful you may find along the way, and she will reward your generosity.
Your kindness is greatly appreciated, and shall not soon be forgotten.
Now, come along. Follow me up the steps to the portal, and I will send you on your way.
Be strong, friend! The journey is a perilous one!
Now who are you? You're not my usual visitor, and believe me, there aren't many who venture across the ruins! Why did you come here?
Oh? The sorceress sent you? ...Yes, of course, the solstice. That'd explain it. Well, why did she send you?
Ah, you've brought me something? A few somethings? Well, I appreciate it! Let's see what you've brought me...
This is quite a haul! I'm in your debt. I can offer you this as a reward: a token for the genetic builder.
If you come back again and bring me more nice things, maybe I'll give you another!
Now, I suppose you'd like some help getting home? I can do that. Let's get moving, then, the sun will be setting soon.
